name: Crazy Snake
description:
Help Crazy Snake to cross the forest through 5 levels. 

Crazy Snake is greedy and will eat all mushrooms crossing his road : the more he eats, the more he becomes uncontrollable.

Control crazy snake with either :

  • WSAD for querty keyboard layout
  • ZSQD for azerty keyboard layout
  • Arrow keys

Made for the Ludum Dare 40 - Compo (48h) competition.
